text: Debra-Ann Patricia Toporowski (Quwâ€™utsun: ) is a British Columbia New Democratic Party member of the British Columbia Legislative Assembly for the riding of Cowichan Valley. First elected in the 2024 provincial election, Toporowski succeeded outgoing MLA Sonia Furstenau, who vacated the seat in order to run in the riding of Victoria-Beacon Hill. Category:Living people
title: Debra Toporowski
